member.name: ID2D1ComputeTransform.CalculateThreadgroups
member.summary: This method allows a compute-shader–based transform to select the number of thread groups to execute based on the number of output pixels it needs to fill.
member.param: The output rectangle that will be filled by the compute transform.
The number of threads in the x dimension.
The number of threads in the y dimension.
The number of threads in the z dimension.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ComputeTransform.SetComputeInfo
member.summary: Sets the render information used to specify the compute shader pass.
member.param: The render information object to set.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ComputeTransform
member.summary: Defines a transform that uses a compute shader.
